text: Arthur Kristiansen (18 July 1923 – 7 July 2001) was a Norwegian ice hockey player, born in Oslo, Norway. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in 1952, where the Norwegian team placed 9th. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1923 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Ice hockey players at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Arthur Kristiansen
